original: @63b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @63b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'ary'a pi th'i shva ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: a'ary'a pi th'i shva ri s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Aryapithasvarasadhana-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Means of Achieving the Noble Lady of the Sacred Site, called The Means of Achieving the Noble Lady of the Sacred Site

original: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Noble Lady of the Sacred Site.

original: de nas gsang pa bdag gis bshad //
analyzed: de nas gsang pa bdag gis bshad //
translated: Then, the secret one, I will explain.

original: gsang ba'i de nyid man ngag ste //
analyzed: gsang ba'i de nyid man ngag ste //
translated: The secret reality is the esoteric instruction,

original: cho ga snga dro langs nas ni //
analyzed: cho ga snga dro langs nas ni //
translated: The ritual, having risen in the morning,

original: snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis su //
analyzed: snying rjes brlan pa'i sems kyis su //
translated: With a mind moistened by compassion,

original: yid ni g-yo ba med bya ste //
analyzed: yid ni g-yo ba med bya ste //
translated: The mind should be made unmoving,

original: sems can thams cad gnod bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad gnod bya'o //
translated: And all sentient beings should be harmed.

original: bdud rtsi lnga ni blangs nas su //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga ni blangs nas su //
translated: Having taken the five nectars,🔽Place them in the skull-cup with an unfabricated mind.

original: thod par rtog med sems kyis bzhag / rlung dang me yi steng du ni //
analyzed: thod par rtog med sems kyis bzhag / rlung dang me yi steng du ni //
translated: On the wind and fire,

original: dag dang khol dang tshos par bya //
analyzed: dag dang khol dang tshos par bya //
translated: Purify, boil, and cook.

original: nor 'dzin mandala byas nas ni //
analyzed: nor 'dzin mandala byas nas ni //
translated: Having made a maṇḍala on the earth,

original: byang chub yan lag rab tu sbyin //
analyzed: byang chub yan lag rab tu sbyin //
translated: Give the limbs of enlightenment.

original: 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
translated: Having sat on a soft seat,

original: rab brtan rdo rje skyil krung bcas //
analyzed: rab brtan rdo rje skyil krung bcas //
translated: Firmly sit in the vajra posture.

original: ting 'dzin phyag rgya yang dag bya //
analyzed: ting 'dzin phyag rgya yang dag bya //
translated: And the mudrā of samādhi is well performed.

original: khams gsum stong pa nyid du blta //
analyzed: khams gsum stong pa nyid du blta //
translated: The three realms are seen as emptiness.

original: 'di ni thams cad rmi lam 'dra //
analyzed: 'di ni thams cad rmi lam 'dra //
translated: This is all like a dream.

original: nye bar rnyed pa gang yang med //
analyzed: nye bar rnyed pa gang yang med //
translated: There is nothing whatsoever to be attained.

original: dri za'i grong khyer rnam pa 'dra //
analyzed: dri za'i grong khyer rnam pa 'dra //
translated: Like a gandharva city,

original: 'gro ba sgyu mar bltas pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba sgyu mar bltas pa'o //
translated: The world is seen as an illusion.

original: thugs ka'i nam mkha'i dbus gnas par //
analyzed: thugs ka'i nam mkha'i dbus gnas par //
translated: In the center of the space at the heart,

original: ye shes zla ba dri med bya //
analyzed: ye shes zla ba dri med bya //
translated: One should visualize the stainless moon of wisdom.

original: dbus su tam yig bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: dbus su tam yig bsam mi khyab //
translated: In the center of that, the syllable taṃ is inconceivable,

original: 'od zer lnga ldan 'bar ba yis //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga ldan 'bar ba yis //
translated: Blazing with five-colored light rays.

original: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
analyzed: phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
translated: The buddhas dwelling in the ten directions

original: sgrol ma'i gzugs rnams rnam bsgom bya //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i gzugs rnams rnam bsgom bya //
translated: Are all visualized in the form of Tārā.

original: de rnams spyan drangs byin gyis brlab //
analyzed: de rnams spyan drangs byin gyis brlab //
translated: They are invited and blessed.

original: ye shes @64a * //
analyzed: ye shes @64a * //
translated: The wisdom

original: sku ni rjes su dran //
analyzed: sku ni rjes su dran //
translated: kāya is recalled.

original: de ni sems can thams cad la //
analyzed: de ni sems can thams cad la //
translated: Then, for all sentient beings,

original: ye shes 'od zer rnam dag bya //
analyzed: ye shes 'od zer rnam dag bya //
translated: The pure light rays of wisdom

original: sangs rgyas de nyid rab gnas bya //
analyzed: sangs rgyas de nyid rab gnas bya //
translated: Are fully established in the state of buddhahood.

original: byang chub snying po mchis kyi bar //
analyzed: byang chub snying po mchis kyi bar //
translated: Until the essence of enlightenment is attained,

original: myur du sangs rgyas sgrol ma can //
analyzed: myur du sangs rgyas sgrol ma can //
translated: The buddhas are quickly visualized as Tārā.

original: nam mkha' yi ni mdun du blta //
analyzed: nam mkha' yi ni mdun du blta //
translated: One should look into the sky in front.

original: ye shes mchod pa sna tshogs pa ;
analyzed: ye shes mchod pa sna tshogs pa ;
translated: The various wisdom offerings

original: / ye shes las ni skyes pas bya //
analyzed: / ye shes las ni skyes pas bya //
translated: are made from wisdom.

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
translated: Go for refuge to the Three Jewels,

original: sems can thams cad don byas te //
analyzed: sems can thams cad don byas te //
translated: and benefit all sentient beings.🔽In the presence of the guru, confess

original: cho ga gsum gyi sbas pa'i sdig / bla ma'i mdun du rab tu bshags //
analyzed: cho ga gsum gyi sbas pa'i sdig / bla ma'i mdun du rab tu bshags //
translated: all the hidden sins of the three doors.

original: sdig pa thams cad grol bdag nyid //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad grol bdag nyid //
translated: Liberated from all sins,

original: myur du sangs rgyas thob pa'o //
analyzed: myur du sangs rgyas thob pa'o //
translated: one will quickly attain buddhahood.

original: bdag nyid sgrol ma'i rnam par bya //
analyzed: bdag nyid sgrol ma'i rnam par bya //
translated: Visualize oneself in the form of Tārā

original: 'gro kun de bzhin sgrol ma ru //
analyzed: 'gro kun de bzhin sgrol ma ru //
translated: and all beings as Tārā.

original: bltas nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: bltas nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni //
translated: Then, the buddhas

original: byin brlabs sa bon de rab bzhugs //
analyzed: byin brlabs sa bon de rab bzhugs //
translated: bless the seed syllable.🔽All phenomena are free from conceptualization,

original: chos rnams rnam rtog bral ba dang // rang bzhin med cing bdag med rnams //
analyzed: chos rnams rnam rtog bral ba dang // rang bzhin med cing bdag med rnams //
translated: without intrinsic nature and identityless.

original: dbyer med rnal 'byor pas gzigs bya //
analyzed: dbyer med rnal 'byor pas gzigs bya //
translated: The yogin sees them as inseparable.

original: sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya //🔽aom sv'a bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a: sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
analyzed: sngags 'di dag ni brjod par bya // aom sv'a bh'a wa shuddha:sarba dharm'a: sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
translated: Recite these mantras:🔽Oṃ svabhāva śuddhāḥ sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ

original: aom sv'a bh'a wa sh'u n+ya t'a sarba dharm'a sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
analyzed: aom sv'a bh'a wa sh'u n+ya t'a sarba dharm'a sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
translated: Oṃ svabhāva śūnyatā sarvadharmāḥ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
translated: Oṃ śūnyatājñānavajrasvabhāvātmako ’haṃ.🔽In the middle of the realm of space,

original: nam mkha'i khams zla dbus gnas par //🔽stong pa nyid kyi ye shes mchog / de yi lte ba'i dbus na ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams zla dbus gnas par // stong pa nyid kyi ye shes mchog / de yi lte ba'i dbus na ni //
translated: in the center of a moon,🔽is the supreme wisdom of emptiness,

original: zla bar ham yig ye shes so //
analyzed: zla bar ham yig ye shes so //
translated: in the center of which is a moon with the syllable haṃ, the wisdom.

original: rdo rje'i rlung dang me dang chu //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rlung dang me dang chu //
translated: The vajra wind, fire, and water

original: de nas sa yi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de nas sa yi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: are then the maṇḍala of earth.

original: ri rab dang ni bhr'um las byung //
analyzed: ri rab dang ni bhr'um las byung //
translated: Mount Meru arises from bhrūṃ.

original: gzhal yas khang ni rnam par blta //
analyzed: gzhal yas khang ni rnam par blta //
translated: View the celestial mansion

original: de yi dbus su padmar gnas //
analyzed: de yi dbus su padmar gnas //
translated: in the center of that, abiding in a lotus,

original: lte ba ge sar 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: lte ba ge sar 'bar ba'o //
translated: with a blazing pericarp,

original: 'dab ma brgyad ldan dga' ba'o //
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad ldan dga' ba'o //
translated: with eight petals, delightful,

original: rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa'i //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa'i //
translated: captivating with various forms.

original: de phyir 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: de phyir 'bar ba'i 'khor lo ste //
translated: Outside of that is the blazing maṇḍala,

original: rtsibs ni bcu gnyis shin tu mdzes //
analyzed: rtsibs ni bcu gnyis shin tu mdzes //
translated: very beautiful with twelve spokes,

original: thig ni lnga dang yang dag ldan //🔽de yi sgo ni bzhi pa la //
analyzed: thig ni lnga dang yang dag ldan // de yi sgo ni bzhi pa la //
translated: endowed with five lines,🔽with four gates,

original: lha yi rta babs rnam bzhi'o //
analyzed: lha yi rta babs rnam bzhi'o //
translated: and four celestial mansions of the deities.

original: me long la sogs rnams kyis brgyan //
analyzed: me long la sogs rnams kyis brgyan //
translated: It is adorned with mirrors and so forth,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'o //
translated: blessed by all buddhas.

original: gnas skyes rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: gnas skyes rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: The yoginīs born in the directions are the yoginīs.

original: phyogs skyong mgon po rnams spyan drangs //
analyzed: phyogs skyong mgon po rnams spyan drangs //
translated: The lords of the directions are invited.

original: byang sems de bzhin gshegs par rnams //
analyzed: byang sems de bzhin gshegs par rnams //
translated: The bodhisattvas are the tathāgatas.

original: ye shes rlung gis dgug par bya //
analyzed: ye shes rlung gis dgug par bya //
translated: They are summoned by the wind of gnosis.

original: rnal 'byor ma kun dga' byed rnams //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma kun dga' byed rnams //
translated: The yoginīs are the bringers of joy.

original: kun mkhyen til gyi gang bu rnams //
analyzed: kun mkhyen til gyi gang bu rnams //
translated: The all-knowing ones are the sesame pods.

original: zla bar rab tu zhugs par bsgoms //🔽@64b de gyur pa las bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: zla bar rab tu zhugs par bsgoms // @64b de gyur pa las bdag nyid ni //
translated: They are meditated on as entering the moon.🔽From that transformation, one should meditate on oneself

original: lha mo sgrol mar bsgom par bya //
analyzed: lha mo sgrol mar bsgom par bya //
translated: as the goddess Tārā.

original: sku mdog dmar la zhal bzhi pa //
analyzed: sku mdog dmar la zhal bzhi pa //
translated: Her color is red, and she has four faces.

original: phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
analyzed: phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan //
translated: She is adorned with eight arms.

original: nyi ma 'char ka brgya yi ngang //
analyzed: nyi ma 'char ka brgya yi ngang //
translated: She has the luster of a hundred rising suns.

original: dang po'i zhal ni dran par bya //
analyzed: dang po'i zhal ni dran par bya //
translated: One should recall her first face,

original: dri med nam mkha'i rang bzhin sngo //
analyzed: dri med nam mkha'i rang bzhin sngo //
translated: blue in color, the nature of stainless space.

original: g-yas kyi zhal ni dran par bya //
analyzed: g-yas kyi zhal ni dran par bya //
translated: One should recall her right face,

original: sha ka sa la sha bzhin ljang //
analyzed: sha ka sa la sha bzhin ljang //
translated: green like a shāka leaf.

original: g-yas kyi zhal ni yid dga' bas //
analyzed: g-yas kyi zhal ni yid dga' bas //
translated: The right face is delightful.

original: de ltar dkon mchog gsum drag po //
analyzed: de ltar dkon mchog gsum drag po //
translated: Thus the three jewels are fierce,

original: rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal 'jigs byed //
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal 'jigs byed //
translated: with a terrifyingly contorted face.

original: cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po //
analyzed: cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa po //
translated: Slightly baring his fangs,

original: mi sdug de nas bsgom par bya //
analyzed: mi sdug de nas bsgom par bya //
translated: he should meditate on the ugly one.

original: ser po zhi ba steng gi zhal //
analyzed: ser po zhi ba steng gi zhal //
translated: The upper face is yellow and peaceful,

original: rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan pa'o //
translated: adorned with all the ornaments.

original: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa'o //
translated: His head is adorned with a garland of skulls,

original: ye shes lnga ni nye bar mdzes //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ni nye bar mdzes //
translated: beautified with the five awarenesses.

original: de ltar de ni gzi brjid che //
analyzed: de ltar de ni gzi brjid che //
translated: Thus he is greatly radiant,

original: zhal bzhi par ni bsam gtan bya //
analyzed: zhal bzhi par ni bsam gtan bya //
translated: one should meditate on the four-faced one.🔽He holds a skull, vajra, sword,

original: thod pa rdo rje ral gri dang // da ma ru g-yas phyag na bsnams //
analyzed: thod pa rdo rje ral gri dang // da ma ru g-yas phyag na bsnams //
translated: and ḍamaru in his right hands,🔽and a wish-fulfilling gem, khaṭvāṅga,

original: yid bzhin nor bu kha tv'am ga / dril bu de bzhin autpala dmar //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu kha tv'am ga / dril bu de bzhin autpala dmar //
translated: bell, and red utpala in his left hands.

original: de yi g-yon par bsgom par bya //🔽de yi brla la yod pa ni //
analyzed: de yi g-yon par bsgom par bya // de yi brla la yod pa ni //
translated: One should meditate on him in this way.🔽On his thighs

original: stag gi sham thabs gyon pa'o //🔽skyil krung phyed pa'i gar byed pa //
analyzed: stag gi sham thabs gyon pa'o // skyil krung phyed pa'i gar byed pa //
translated: he wears a tiger skin.🔽He dances in half-cross-legged posture,

original: sna tshogs padma zla dbus gnas //
analyzed: sna tshogs padma zla dbus gnas //
translated: standing in the center of a variegated lotus and moon.

original: snying rje'i khro ba 'jigs byed ma //
analyzed: snying rje'i khro ba 'jigs byed ma //
translated: He is the wrathful one of compassion,

original: spyan gsum dmar po bgrad pa'o //
analyzed: spyan gsum dmar po bgrad pa'o //
translated: with three eyes wide open and red.

original: drag po g-yon phyogs lta bar byed //
analyzed: drag po g-yon phyogs lta bar byed //
translated: He looks to the left at Rudra,

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rtag gnas //
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la rtag gnas //
translated: always standing in the center of a wind mandala.

original: gnas rnams kyang ni dgug pa'i mchod //
analyzed: gnas rnams kyang ni dgug pa'i mchod //
translated: The places are also worshipped by summoning.

original: rnal 'byor ma tshogs dbus gnas par //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma tshogs dbus gnas par //
translated: In the midst of the assembly of yoginis,

original: bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'o //
translated: all bliss is bestowed.

original: p'u dza ao aa go ra de ma //
analyzed: p'u dza ao aa go ra de ma //
translated: Pooja o agordame

original: ka ao tri ko ka la hi //
analyzed: ka ao tri ko ka la hi //
translated: Ka otri ko kalahi

original: pre gri soo su na si ma ku //
analyzed: pre gri soo su na si ma ku //
translated: Pre gri so su nashi mu

original: de ltar yi ge nyi shu bzhi //
analyzed: de ltar yi ge nyi shu bzhi //
translated: Thus, the twenty-four letters

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: are the mandala of the yoginis.

original: lus la cho ga'i cho ga yis //
analyzed: lus la cho ga'i cho ga yis //
translated: By the ritual of the body,

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu 'grub //🔽mtshog kha spyi bo rna ba g-yas //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu 'grub // mtshog kha spyi bo rna ba g-yas //
translated: the lord of yogins is accomplished.🔽The crown, head, right ear,🔽back of the neck, left ear,

original: ltag pa g-yon gyi rna ba dag / smin mtshams dang ni spyan dang ni //
analyzed: ltag pa g-yon gyi rna ba dag / smin mtshams dang ni spyan dang ni //
translated: between the eyebrows, eyes,

original: dpung pa'i rtsa gnyis de bzhin no //
analyzed: dpung pa'i rtsa gnyis de bzhin no //
translated: and the two shoulder joints,

original: mchan khung gnyis dang nu ma gnyis //
analyzed: mchan khung gnyis dang nu ma gnyis //
translated: the two armpits, two breasts,🔽the navel, tip of the nose,

original: lte ba'i sna yi rtse mo dang // kha dang mgul la go cha bya //
analyzed: lte ba'i sna yi rtse mo dang // kha dang mgul la go cha bya //
translated: mouth, and throat should be armored.

original: snying ga dang ni mdoms dang ni //🔽gsang gnas bshang lam de bzhin brla //
analyzed: snying ga dang ni mdoms dang ni // gsang gnas bshang lam de bzhin brla //
translated: The heart, genitals,

original: pus mo go rims ji bzhin no //
analyzed: pus mo go rims ji bzhin no //
translated: anus, and likewise the thighs,🔽knees, and shins🔽in order.

original: dang po su ra te shva ri ti //
analyzed: dang po su ra te shva ri ti //
translated: First, suratasvarīti,

original: gnyis par su ra ta sonta ri //
analyzed: gnyis par su ra ta sonta ri //
translated: In the second, Suratasontari,🔽In the third, Suratacandra,

original: gsum ba su ra ta tsandra dang // bzhi pa su ra ta ma li ni //
analyzed: gsum ba su ra ta tsandra dang // bzhi pa su ra ta ma li ni //
translated: In the fourth, Suratamalini,

original: lnga pa @65a * //
analyzed: lnga pa @65a * //
translated: In the fifth,

original: su rat bha kshi'o //
analyzed: su rat bha kshi'o //
translated: Suratabhakshi,

original: drug pa su ra ta ka mi ni //
analyzed: drug pa su ra ta ka mi ni //
translated: In the sixth, Suratakamini,🔽In the seventh, Suratogri,

original: bdun pa su rat au gra dang // brgyad pa su rat autta ma //
analyzed: bdun pa su rat au gra dang // brgyad pa su rat autta ma //
translated: And in the eighth, Suratottamah.

original: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas song bsgom //
analyzed: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas song bsgom //
translated: Having gone to the places and the neighboring places, one should meditate.

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu gyur //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu gyur //
translated: One becomes a lord of yogins.🔽White, green, blue,🔽The fourth is yellow,🔽Yellow, white, red,

original: dkar dang ljang dang sngo ba dang // bzhi pa sku mdog ser po dang // ser dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sku mdog sngon po brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: dkar dang ljang dang sngo ba dang // bzhi pa sku mdog ser po dang // ser dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sku mdog sngon po brgyad pa'o //
translated: And blue is the eighth.

original: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //🔽dril bu da ma rus brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin // dril bu da ma rus brgyan pa'o //
translated: Holding a skull and a khaṭvāṅga,🔽Adorned with a bell and a ḍamaru,

original: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas dbu brgyan pa'o //
translated: Adorned with a garland of skulls.

original: rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
analyzed: rgyan ni thams cad kyis brgyan pa //
translated: Adorned with all ornaments,

original: rin chen ye shes steng dbus brgyan //
analyzed: rin chen ye shes steng dbus brgyan //
translated: Adorned in the middle on a jewel and a lotus,

original: de rnams padma'i 'dab mar gnas //
analyzed: de rnams padma'i 'dab mar gnas //
translated: They stand on lotus petals.

original: shi khi bhi ma shi khand'i //
analyzed: shi khi bhi ma shi khand'i //
translated: Śikhi, Bhima, Śikhandi,

original: ke r'a l'i de bzhin dza ti li //
analyzed: ke r'a l'i de bzhin dza ti li //
translated: And likewise, Keśarī, Jāti,

original: au ti dzi ta de bzhin tsandi //
analyzed: au ti dzi ta de bzhin tsandi //
translated: Ujjayini, likewise Candī,

original: moondi bi ka do autka ti //🔽ki ri di nar te ki dang ngo //
analyzed: moondi bi ka do autka ti // ki ri di nar te ki dang ngo //
translated: Moṇḍī, Bikā, and Utkati,🔽Kirī, Dinārī, and Tike.

original: zhing dang nye zhing tshan do ha //
analyzed: zhing dang nye zhing tshan do ha //
translated: Kṣetra, Upakṣetra, and Candoha,

original: de bzhin nye ba'i tshan do ha //
analyzed: de bzhin nye ba'i tshan do ha //
translated: Likewise Upa-cchandoha,

original: 'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba'o //🔽gnas ni de rnams gnas pa yi //
analyzed: 'du ba nye ba'i 'du ba'o // gnas ni de rnams gnas pa yi //
translated: Saṃgha, and Upa-saṃgha.

original: lha mo bcu gnyis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: lha mo bcu gnyis bsgom par bya //
translated: These are the abodes of the twelve goddesses.

original: phyed dmar phyed ni ljang ba rnams //
analyzed: phyed dmar phyed ni ljang ba rnams //
translated: They are half red and half green,

original: thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
translated: Adorned with a garland of skulls.

original: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams //
translated: They are adorned with various ornaments,

original: skra grol ba dang khro gnyer can //
analyzed: skra grol ba dang khro gnyer can //
translated: Their hair loose, with a frown.

original: rtag pa'i mchog ni dbu rgyan rnams //
analyzed: rtag pa'i mchog ni dbu rgyan rnams //
translated: The supreme eternal ones are the crowns,

original: thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: thod pa kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
translated: Holding a skull and khaṭvāṅga.

original: phyag gzhan 'khor lo rdo rje'o //
analyzed: phyag gzhan 'khor lo rdo rje'o //
translated: The other hands hold a wheel and a vajra.

original: kam pu tsi dang pukka s'e //
analyzed: kam pu tsi dang pukka s'e //
translated: Kaṃbu, Puke,

original: dombi de bzhin ma tam gi / bzhi ni sna tshogs mdog rnams so //
analyzed: dombi de bzhin ma tam gi / bzhi ni sna tshogs mdog rnams so //
translated: and Dombi, likewise Maṭiṅgi, are the four of various colors.

original: sgo srung khro gnyer chen mo'o //🔽mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba //
analyzed: sgo srung khro gnyer chen mo'o // mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba //
translated: The gate guardians are the great frowners.🔽They have a face with bared fangs,

original: g-yon bskum g-yas brkyang nges par gnas //
analyzed: g-yon bskum g-yas brkyang nges par gnas //
translated: Standing with the left leg bent and the right extended.

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
translated: Residing in the orb of the sun,

original: mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig ste //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa yi dam tshig ste //
translated: is the pledge of Akshobhya.

original: dbu rgyan steng du rgyan rnams so //🔽thod pa kha tv'am gi 'dzin pa //
analyzed: dbu rgyan steng du rgyan rnams so // thod pa kha tv'am gi 'dzin pa //
translated: The ornaments are above the crown.🔽Holding a skull and khaṭvāṅga,

original: phyag mtshan gri gug mgo bo bsnams //
analyzed: phyag mtshan gri gug mgo bo bsnams //
translated: the hand implements are a flaying knife and head.

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa //
translated: The body is adorned with all ornaments,

original: bdud bzhi'i steng du yang dag gnas //
analyzed: bdud bzhi'i steng du yang dag gnas //
translated: standing upon the four māras.

original: thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa rnams //
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan pa rnams //
translated: Adorned with a garland of skulls,

original: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod rnams //
analyzed: dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod rnams //
translated: in the charnel grounds and the neighboring charnel grounds,

original: dad sogs dbang po rnam par dag / snying rje ldan pa bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dad sogs dbang po rnam par dag / snying rje ldan pa bsgom par bya //
translated: meditate with faith and so on, the pure sense organs, and compassion.

original: thams cad gcer pu 'dzin pa rnams //
analyzed: thams cad gcer pu 'dzin pa rnams //
translated: All of them are naked,

original: snying rje'i dga' ma mdzes pa rnams //
analyzed: snying rje'i dga' ma mdzes pa rnams //
translated: the beautiful lovers of compassion,

original: lte ba'i dbus su yang dag gnas //
analyzed: lte ba'i dbus su yang dag gnas //
translated: residing in the center of the navel.

original: lha mo sgrol ma rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: lha mo sgrol ma rnam par bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the goddess Tārā.

original: pur ti shva ra'i sde rnams ni //
analyzed: pur ti shva ra'i sde rnams ni //
translated: The Pūrṇagiri group

original: rim dang rim min bskor ba'o //
analyzed: rim dang rim min bskor ba'o //
translated: is arranged in order and reverse order.

original: 'khor lo @65b rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la //
analyzed: 'khor lo @65b rtsibs chen bcu gnyis la //
translated: On the wheel with twelve great spokes,

original: shi khi la sogs nor bur bar //
analyzed: shi khi la sogs nor bur bar //
translated: the jewels beginning with Śikhi

original: rim dang rim pa min pa'o //
analyzed: rim dang rim pa min pa'o //
translated: are in order and reverse order.

original: 'gro ba'i bdag mo rnam par dgod //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bdag mo rnam par dgod //
translated: The mistress of the world is arranged.🔽The bending and stretching of the legs,

original: rkang pa bkug dang brkyang ba dang // yang ni brkyang dang dgug pa'i bar //
analyzed: rkang pa bkug dang brkyang ba dang // yang ni brkyang dang dgug pa'i bar //
translated: and again the stretching and bending,

original: kam pu tsi sogs sgo rnams su //
analyzed: kam pu tsi sogs sgo rnams su //
translated: are the door of the Kambala and so forth.

original: g-yon du bskor bar rnam par dgod//
analyzed: g-yon du bskor bar rnam par dgod//
translated: They are arranged in a counterclockwise circle.

original: de ltar rdzogs pa'i sgrub pa ni //
analyzed: de ltar rdzogs pa'i sgrub pa ni //
translated: Thus the perfect practice

original: dkyil 'khor gnas dang yang dag 'brel //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnas dang yang dag 'brel //
translated: is connected with the place of the maṇḍala.

original: de nas cho ga rab tu phye //
analyzed: de nas cho ga rab tu phye //
translated: Then, the rite is fully opened,

original: rigs lnga po ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rigs lnga po ni bsgom par bya //
translated: and the five families are meditated on.

original: spyi bor brum yig dkar po ste //
analyzed: spyi bor brum yig dkar po ste //
translated: The white letter bhrūṃ is on the crown,🔽the hrīḥ is the color of the sun at the throat,

original: mgrin pa'i hr'i: ni nyi ma'i mdog / brum yig nag po thugs ka ru //
analyzed: mgrin pa'i hr'i: ni nyi ma'i mdog / brum yig nag po thugs ka ru //
translated: the black bhrūṃ is at the heart,🔽the a is the color of gold at the navel,

original: aa ni lte bar gser gyi mdog / gsang ba'i gnas su kham ljang gu //
analyzed: aa ni lte bar gser gyi mdog / gsang ba'i gnas su kham ljang gu //
translated: and the green khaṃ is at the secret place.

original: bsgoms shig rnam pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: bsgoms shig rnam pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: Meditate on the rite of the form.🔽The wheel, lotus, vajra, and supreme jewel

original: 'khor pad rdo rje rin chen mchog / sna tshogs rdo rje 'di rnams gnas //
analyzed: 'khor pad rdo rje rin chen mchog / sna tshogs rdo rje 'di rnams gnas //
translated: are the places of the vajra cross.

original: rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la //
translated: For all yoginīs,

original: cho ga des ni cho ga bya //
analyzed: cho ga des ni cho ga bya //
translated: the rite is performed by that rite.

original: thugs ka'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus //
analyzed: thugs ka'i sa bon 'od lcags kyus //
translated: The light of the seed syllable at the heart is a hook.

original: sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lor dgug / ba spu'i sgo rnams padma gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor lor dgug / ba spu'i sgo rnams padma gnas //
translated: and the pores become lotus seats.

original: mchod pa'i lha mo rang las sprul //
analyzed: mchod pa'i lha mo rang las sprul //
translated: The offering goddesses emanate from oneself.

original: dad pa mchog gis yang dag mchod //
analyzed: dad pa mchog gis yang dag mchod //
translated: One should make perfect offerings with supreme faith.

original: yang ni rang la gzhug par bya //
analyzed: yang ni rang la gzhug par bya //
translated: Then they should be caused to enter oneself.

original: de nas dbang bskur gsol ba gdab //
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur gsol ba gdab //
translated: Then one should request the conferral of empowerment.

original: bde gshegs rnams ni dngos grub ster //
analyzed: bde gshegs rnams ni dngos grub ster //
translated: The sugatas grant spiritual powers.

original: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
translated: Just as soon as one is born,

original: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar //
translated: just as all tathāgatas were bathed,

original: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
analyzed: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
translated: with the pure divine water,

original: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
translated: so I should bathe.

original: aom sarba tishth'a aa bhi she ka sa ma ya hri ye h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba tishth'a aa bhi she ka sa ma ya hri ye h'um /
translated: oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣekasa maya hṛi ye hūṃ

original: aom sarba tishth'a aa bhi she ka ta shodhi a'atma ki sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra /
analyzed: aom sarba tishth'a aa bhi she ka ta shodhi a'atma ki sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra /
translated: oṃ sarva tathāgata abhiṣekata śodhani ātmāki sarasara prasara prasara

original: sarba buddha aa dhishth'i te sv'a h'a /
analyzed: sarba buddha aa dhishth'i te sv'a h'a /
translated: sarva buddha adhiṣṭhite svāhā

original: ma lus sems can thams cad rnams //
analyzed: ma lus sems can thams cad rnams //
translated: All sentient beings without exception

original: sgrol ma'i gzugs su nges lta bar //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i gzugs su nges lta bar //
translated: should be visualized in the form of Tārā.🔽One should meditate by applying meditation,

original: sgom sbyor gyis ni sgom gyis shig / bsgom pa sgom min skad cig tsam //
analyzed: sgom sbyor gyis ni sgom gyis shig / bsgom pa sgom min skad cig tsam //
translated: not meditating for even a moment.

original: gnas kyi man ngag rim gyis dang // bla ma'i rnal 'byor ma rim gyis //
analyzed: gnas kyi man ngag rim gyis dang // bla ma'i rnal 'byor ma rim gyis //
translated: and the yoga of the guru is gradual.

original: man ngag dam tshig rnyed pa ste //
analyzed: man ngag dam tshig rnyed pa ste //
translated: The intimate instruction is the attainment of the samaya.

original: bla ma'i zhabs kyi mchog sbyin gyis //🔽ye shes rtog pa bsgom bdag nyid //
analyzed: bla ma'i zhabs kyi mchog sbyin gyis // ye shes rtog pa bsgom bdag nyid //
translated: The supreme gift of the guru’s feet🔽is the meditation of the concept of gnosis.

original: ye shes rtog pa sgom gyis shig / rtog pa bral ba med pa ni //
analyzed: ye shes rtog pa sgom gyis shig / rtog pa bral ba med pa ni //
translated: Meditate on the concept of gnosis.

original: ye shes ma yin rtog pa min //
analyzed: ye shes ma yin rtog pa min //
translated: That which is free from concepts is neither gnosis nor a concept.

original: chos kyi bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid //
analyzed: chos kyi bdag nyid mnyam pa nyid //
translated: The nature of phenomena is equality.

original: rang gzhan med cing yi ge med //
analyzed: rang gzhan med cing yi ge med //
translated: There is no self and no other, and there are no syllables.

original: sku mdog 'das dang rnam pa med //
analyzed: sku mdog 'das dang rnam pa med //
translated: There is no color and no form.

original: ring po ma yin zlum po min /
analyzed: ring po ma yin zlum po min /
translated: It is neither long nor round.

original: @66a * // de nyid 'byung po thams cad rnams //
analyzed: @66a * // de nyid 'byung po thams cad rnams //
translated: That is the reality of all the bhūtas.

original: rnal 'byor ye shes yid med pa //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ye shes yid med pa //
translated: The yoga of gnosis is without mind.

original: de ni de nyid bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: de ni de nyid bzlas pa yis //
translated: That is the recitation of reality.

original: rnal 'byor dbang phyug thob pa'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang phyug thob pa'o //
translated: One attains the lord of yogins.

original: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re h'um phad /
analyzed: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re h'um phad /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture hūṃ phaṭ

original: de ltar dam tshig sngags yin te //
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig sngags yin te //
translated: In that way, the mantra of samaya

original: bcom ldan 'das mas rab tu bshad //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mas rab tu bshad //
translated: is explained by the Bhagavatī.

original: dang po aom dang de nas ming //
analyzed: dang po aom dang de nas ming //
translated: First, there is oṃ, and then the name,

original: h'um phad yi ge yang dag ldan //
analyzed: h'um phad yi ge yang dag ldan //
translated: The syllables hūṃ and phaṭ are also correct.

original: zlos shig lha mo rnams kyi sngags //
analyzed: zlos shig lha mo rnams kyi sngags //
translated: Recite the mantras of the goddesses.

original: thams cad la ni mchod pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad la ni mchod pa'o //
translated: This is the offering to all.

original: dza:h'um bam ho: sa rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: dza:h'um bam ho: sa rim pa bzhin //
translated: Jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ—these are to be remembered in order

original: sgo rnams la'ang dran par bya //
analyzed: sgo rnams la'ang dran par bya //
translated: at the four doors.

original: aom h'um phat /
analyzed: aom h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: sngar bshad pa yi ming ldan pa //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa yi ming ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with the previously explained names,

original: chog 'di yis yang dag bzla //
analyzed: chog 'di yis yang dag bzla //
translated: recite correctly with this rite.

original: aom tr'am hr'i kham h'um lam mam sam tram dza /
analyzed: aom tr'am hr'i kham h'um lam mam sam tram dza /
translated: Oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā.

original: phung po khams rnams dag pa'o //
analyzed: phung po khams rnams dag pa'o //
translated: The aggregates and constituents are pure.

original: aom a'a: h'um lus ngag yid gsum dag pa yi //
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um lus ngag yid gsum dag pa yi //
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ. The purity of body, speech, and mind,

original: sngar bshad cho gas bsngags pa yis /
analyzed: sngar bshad cho gas bsngags pa yis /
translated: praised with the rite previously explained,

original: cho ga 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya //
analyzed: cho ga 'bum phrag gcig bzlas bya //
translated: is recited one hundred thousand times.

original: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag don //
analyzed: sdig pa thams cad rnam dag don //
translated: For the sake of the complete purification of all misdeeds,

original: sdug bsngal thams cad zad don du //
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad zad don du //
translated: for the sake of the exhaustion of all suffering,

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams rtag tu ni //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams rtag tu ni //
translated: the yogis and yoginīs

original: bdud rtsi lnga ni lha bshos te //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga ni lha bshos te //
translated: always make offerings of the five nectars

original: dus kun rnal 'byor rnams kyi ni //🔽dud 'gro bas da nas mchod par bya //
analyzed: dus kun rnal 'byor rnams kyi ni // dud 'gro bas da nas mchod par bya //
translated: to the yogis and yoginīs at all times.🔽The offering of the five meats🔽is made to the yogis and yoginīs.

original: sngags pas ts'a ru'i bsgrub pa bya //
analyzed: sngags pas ts'a ru'i bsgrub pa bya //
translated: The mantrin should perform the sādhana of cāru.

original: rnal 'byor ma ldan bza' bar bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma ldan bza' bar bya //
translated: One should eat without the yoginīs.

original: bza' dang bza' min bza' bar bya //
analyzed: bza' dang bza' min bza' bar bya //
translated: One should eat what is edible and inedible.

original: btung dang btung min rtag tu btung //
analyzed: btung dang btung min rtag tu btung //
translated: One should always drink what is drinkable and undrinkable.

original: bya dang bya min bya ba'o //
analyzed: bya dang bya min bya ba'o //
translated: One should do what is doable and undoable.

original: rnal 'byor ma tshogs dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma tshogs dkyil 'khor du //
translated: In the maṇḍala of the assembly of yoginīs,

original: sdig pa yis ni mi reg go //
analyzed: sdig pa yis ni mi reg go //
translated: one is not touched by evil.

original: mnyam nyid bstan pa'i chos nyid do //
analyzed: mnyam nyid bstan pa'i chos nyid do //
translated: This is the reality of the teaching of equality.

original: rnal 'byor bla med nor bu'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bla med nor bu'o //
translated: It is the jewel of highest yoga.

original: gsang ba bla med bla med do //
analyzed: gsang ba bla med bla med do //
translated: It is the unsurpassed secret.

original: rab snang min pa bshad min bya //
analyzed: rab snang min pa bshad min bya //
translated: One should not explain it to those who are not receptive.

original: skye ba 'di la grub pa thob //
analyzed: skye ba 'di la grub pa thob //
translated: One attains accomplishment in this life.

original: srog gcod la sogs spangs pa ste //
analyzed: srog gcod la sogs spangs pa ste //
translated: One abandons killing and so forth.

original: brdzun dang phra ma mi bya'o //
analyzed: brdzun dang phra ma mi bya'o //
translated: One should not lie or slander.

original: blo ni sems can don du bya //
analyzed: blo ni sems can don du bya //
translated: One’s mind should be for the benefit of sentient beings.

original: de ni rnal 'byor thob pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rnal 'byor thob pa'o //
translated: That is the attainment of yoga.

original: dge ba bcu ni nges par bya //
analyzed: dge ba bcu ni nges par bya //
translated: One should definitely practice the ten virtues,🔽and likewise the four brahmavihāras,

original: de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang // sbyin pa la sogs gtong la dga' //
analyzed: de bzhin tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang // sbyin pa la sogs gtong la dga' //
translated: and take delight in giving generosity and so forth.

original: mnyes shing mchog ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: mnyes shing mchog ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: One should please and accomplish the supreme.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor bla med bsgom //🔽ji ltar blo yi rim pa ltar //
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor bla med bsgom //🔽ji ltar blo yi rim pa ltar //
translated: Moreover, one should meditate on the highest yoga.

original: rnal 'byor sogs bdag rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sogs bdag rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The yoginīs, etc.

original: rigs rim ji ltar bstan bcos so //
analyzed: rigs rim ji ltar bstan bcos so //
translated: The families are taught in the treatises in order.

original: ri dags thogs pa sna tshogs pa de nyi la //
analyzed: ri dags thogs pa sna tshogs pa de nyi la //
translated: The various kinds of deer are taught in the treatises.

original: sgrol ma bdag nyid bsgom bya ba //
analyzed: sgrol ma bdag nyid bsgom bya ba //
translated: One should meditate on one’s own nature as Tārā,

original: sna tshogs mdog dang zhal bzhi pa //
analyzed: sna tshogs mdog dang zhal bzhi pa //
translated: multicolored, with four faces,

original: g-yon bskum g-yas @66b brkyang gnas pa ste //
analyzed: g-yon bskum g-yas @66b brkyang gnas pa ste //
translated: standing with the left leg bent and the right extended,

original: dbus kyi zhal ni ljang ga la //🔽g-yas ni ser bar blta bar bya //
analyzed: dbus kyi zhal ni ljang ga la // g-yas ni ser bar blta bar bya //
translated: with the central face green,🔽and the right face to be seen as yellow,

original: g-yon gyi zhal ni sngo ba la //
analyzed: g-yon gyi zhal ni sngo ba la //
translated: the left face blue,

original: steng gi zhal ni dkar ba'o //
analyzed: steng gi zhal ni dkar ba'o //
translated: and the upper face white.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab mche ba gtsigs //🔽thod pas dbu la brgyan ba mo //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab mche ba gtsigs // thod pas dbu la brgyan ba mo //
translated: She bares her fangs in an inconceivable way,🔽and is adorned with a head ornament of skulls.

original: dbu la don yod grub pas brgyan //
analyzed: dbu la don yod grub pas brgyan //
translated: She is adorned with Amoghasiddhi on her head,

original: mi yi rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
analyzed: mi yi rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan //
translated: and is adorned with ornaments of human bone.

original: skra grol mig ni yangs pa mo //
analyzed: skra grol mig ni yangs pa mo //
translated: Her hair is loose, and her eyes are wide.

original: spyan gsum dmar mo mdzes ma ste //🔽ral gri rdo rje gsor ba ste //
analyzed: spyan gsum dmar mo mdzes ma ste // ral gri rdo rje gsor ba ste //
translated: She is beautiful with three red eyes,🔽wielding a sword and a vajra,

original: 'khor lo lcags kyu 'dzin pa mo //
analyzed: 'khor lo lcags kyu 'dzin pa mo //
translated: holding a chakram and a goad,

original: dril bu thugs kar sdigs mdzub mdzad //
analyzed: dril bu thugs kar sdigs mdzub mdzad //
translated: holding a bell at her heart and making a threatening gesture,

original: gri gug mgo bo'i lag pa gzhan //
analyzed: gri gug mgo bo'i lag pa gzhan //
translated: and holding a flaying knife and a head with her other hands.

original: autpala thod pa kha tv'am ga / tshangs pa'i pags pa steng du gnas //
analyzed: autpala thod pa kha tv'am ga / tshangs pa'i pags pa steng du gnas //
translated: The skull of the utpala, the khaṭvāṅga, and the skin of Brahmā.

original: khyab 'jug dbang phyug che zhabs dag / mnan pas gdan la 'jigs rung 'gyur //
analyzed: khyab 'jug dbang phyug che zhabs dag / mnan pas gdan la 'jigs rung 'gyur //
translated: The feet of Viṣṇu and Maheśvara are terrifying on the seat.

original: sngar smos rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams //
analyzed: sngar smos rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams //
translated: The assembly of yoginīs mentioned previously

original: reg gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: reg gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
translated: are in the middle of the maṇḍala of touch.

original: de rnams thams cad sna tshogs mdog / gcer bu 'jigs pa'i rjes su song //
analyzed: de rnams thams cad sna tshogs mdog / gcer bu 'jigs pa'i rjes su song //
translated: All of them are multicolored, naked, and terrifying.

original: gsang ba zab mo bla med sngags //
analyzed: gsang ba zab mo bla med sngags //
translated: The secret, profound, unsurpassed mantra

original: dbu rgyan dpal rim las byung ba //
analyzed: dbu rgyan dpal rim las byung ba //
translated: arises from the glorious stage of the crown.

original: rnal 'byor ma gnas thams cad la //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma gnas thams cad la //
translated: In all the places of the yoginīs,🔽the stage of correct conduct is supreme.

original: rim pa yang dag spyod pa mchog / gnas kun bla med mnyam sbyor te //
analyzed: rim pa yang dag spyod pa mchog / gnas kun bla med mnyam sbyor te //
translated: The unsurpassed union of all places

original: rnal 'byor ma thugs bla na med //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma thugs bla na med //
translated: is the unsurpassed mind of the yoginīs.

original: lha mo'i las ni thams cad byed //
analyzed: lha mo'i las ni thams cad byed //
translated: It performs all the tasks of the goddesses.

original: dag pa sdig pa sel bar byed //
analyzed: dag pa sdig pa sel bar byed //
translated: It purifies and removes sin.

original: mnyam gzhag med pa'i sgrub pa yis //
analyzed: mnyam gzhag med pa'i sgrub pa yis //
translated: The practice without equipoise

original: rnal 'byor bsgom pa sgom pa ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor bsgom pa sgom pa ste //
translated: is the meditation of the meditation of yoga.

original: sngags pas rtag tu bsam gtan gang //
analyzed: sngags pas rtag tu bsam gtan gang //
translated: The concentration of the mantrin

original: nyon mongs ma lus zad par 'gyur //
analyzed: nyon mongs ma lus zad par 'gyur //
translated: destroys all afflictions without exception.

original: g-yo dang mi g-yo sa gzhir ro //
analyzed: g-yo dang mi g-yo sa gzhir ro //
translated: The ground is the movable and unmovable.

original: de yi rnal 'byor che rnams spyod //
analyzed: de yi rnal 'byor che rnams spyod //
translated: The great yogis practice there.

original: gnas kyi cho ga grub pa bdag nyid //
analyzed: gnas kyi cho ga grub pa bdag nyid //
translated: The one who has accomplished the rite of the site

original: ji ltar bde bas spyad par bya //
analyzed: ji ltar bde bas spyad par bya //
translated: should practice as he likes.

original: h'um thugs kar ro //
analyzed: h'um thugs kar ro //
translated: HUM at the heart.

original: aom mtshog khar ro //
analyzed: aom mtshog khar ro //
translated: OM at the crown.

original: hr'i: spyi bor ro //🔽h'um spyan la'o //
analyzed: hr'i: spyi bor ro // h'um spyan la'o //
translated: HRIH at the head.🔽HUM at the eyes.

original: h'um go cha'o //
analyzed: h'um go cha'o //
translated: HUM at the armor.

original: phat phyag 'tshal la'o //
analyzed: phat phyag 'tshal la'o //
translated: PHAT at the salutation.

original: go cha'i go cha 'dir shes bya //
analyzed: go cha'i go cha 'dir shes bya //
translated: The armor of armor should be known here.

original: rim pa'i rjes su rim pa ni //
analyzed: rim pa'i rjes su rim pa ni //
translated: The stages are in the order of the stages.

original: bdag nyid yi dam lha grub bdag /'gro ba ma lus di ltar blta //
analyzed: bdag nyid yi dam lha grub bdag /'gro ba ma lus di ltar blta //
translated: I see all beings in this way,

original: srid pa'i dba' rlabs sgrol sgrol ma //
analyzed: srid pa'i dba' rlabs sgrol sgrol ma //
translated: liberating the waves of existence.

original: bsgom pa bzlas pa rtag tu bya //
analyzed: bsgom pa bzlas pa rtag tu bya //
translated: Always practice meditation and recitation.

original: dur khrod dam ni shing gcig gam //
analyzed: dur khrod dam ni shing gcig gam //
translated: In a charnel ground, or a solitary tree,

original: ri yi rtse mo sa phug khyim //
analyzed: ri yi rtse mo sa phug khyim //
translated: a mountain peak, a cave, a house,

original: khyim mam smad 'tshong gnas su'am //
analyzed: khyim mam smad 'tshong gnas su'am //
translated: a house, or a prostitute's place,

original: gzhan yang / rgyal po'i khab tu'am rtags gcig drung //🔽phyi yi nags tshal shi ba'i gnas //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rgyal po'i khab tu'am rtags gcig drung // phyi yi nags tshal shi ba'i gnas //
translated: or else, at a king's palace, or near a sign,

original: rgya @67a * //
analyzed: rgya @67a * //
translated: an external forest, a dead person's place,

original: mtsho dang ni chu mig rnams //
analyzed: mtsho dang ni chu mig rnams //
translated: an ocean, or a spring,

original: ma mo'i gnas su nges par gnas //
analyzed: ma mo'i gnas su nges par gnas //
translated: One should certainly abide in the abode of the Mothers.

original: gang yang lon med grub pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang lon med grub pa'o //
translated: One who does not obtain anything is accomplished.

original: thogs med rtag tu sbyang bar bya //🔽rnal 'byor de yis sgom pa rnams //
analyzed: thogs med rtag tu sbyang bar bya // rnal 'byor de yis sgom pa rnams //
translated: One should always train without obstruction.🔽Those yogis who meditate

original: gnas kyi sde yi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: gnas kyi sde yi rnal 'byor ma //
translated: are the yoginis of the abode class.

original: rigs kyi rdo rje skyes pa'ang rung //
analyzed: rigs kyi rdo rje skyes pa'ang rung //
translated: One born of the vajra family

original: ye shes rdo rje'i sgom pa'ang //🔽rim pa sde yi rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje'i sgom pa'ang // rim pa sde yi rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: is also the meditator on the vajra of wisdom.🔽The yogi of the stage class

original: bla yi sde yi rjes rim pa'o //
analyzed: bla yi sde yi rjes rim pa'o //
translated: is the one who follows the stages of the guru class.

original: byang chub sems ni rab brtan bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rab brtan bya //
translated: One should stabilize the spirit of enlightenment.

original: thams cad shin tu rab brtan blo //🔽bden min rnam par rtog pa bral //
analyzed: thams cad shin tu rab brtan blo // bden min rnam par rtog pa bral //
translated: One should have a mind that is very stable in all things.

original: yul chos rnam par spang bar bya //
analyzed: yul chos rnam par spang bar bya //
translated: One should abandon the object and the phenomena that are not true and are free from conceptualization.

original: lus dang ngag yid sde yis ni //
analyzed: lus dang ngag yid sde yis ni //
translated: By means of the body, speech, and mind classes,

original: myur du de gsung dngos grub thob //
analyzed: myur du de gsung dngos grub thob //
translated: one will quickly attain the powers of his speech.🔽One should meditate on the letter oṃ

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //🔽aom yig dag ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa // aom yig dag ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: in the center of a moon maṇḍala.

original: spyi bo'i steng du song bar lta //
analyzed: spyi bo'i steng du song bar lta //
translated: One should see it go to the top of one’s head

original: bdud rtsi lnga yi char phab bo //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga yi char phab bo //
translated: and rain down the five elixirs.

original: ji ltar rnal 'byor rab tu bya //
analyzed: ji ltar rnal 'byor rab tu bya //
translated: One should perform the yoga as it is.

original: au pa ha ra dbul bar bya //
analyzed: au pa ha ra dbul bar bya //
translated: One should offer upahāra.

original: der ni rnal 'byor rnal 'byor gyis //
analyzed: der ni rnal 'byor rnal 'byor gyis //
translated: There, by the yoga of yoga,

original: skad cig tsam gyis gzi brjid 'grub //
analyzed: skad cig tsam gyis gzi brjid 'grub //
translated: one attains splendor in an instant.

original: rnal 'byor thams cad sel bar byed //
analyzed: rnal 'byor thams cad sel bar byed //
translated: One removes all yogas.

original: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i gtam //
analyzed: ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i gtam //
translated: Just as the teaching of Vajrasattva,

original: sgrol ma'i gzugs ni gzugs chen mo //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i gzugs ni gzugs chen mo //
translated: the form of Tara is the great form.

original: bsgoms shig de nyid yang dag don //
analyzed: bsgoms shig de nyid yang dag don //
translated: Meditate on that very reality.

original: bam yig khar song bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bam yig khar song bsgom par bya //
translated: One should meditate on the syllable Bam gone to the mouth.

original: aom ni lce yi rtse mor blta //
analyzed: aom ni lce yi rtse mor blta //
translated: Om is seen at the tip of the tongue.

original: thams cad bza' ba'i gnas yin cing //
analyzed: thams cad bza' ba'i gnas yin cing //
translated: Everything is the abode of eating,

original: yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin no //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu mchog bzhin no //
translated: like the supreme wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: zhi ba thams cad sdug bsngal sel //
analyzed: zhi ba thams cad sdug bsngal sel //
translated: All pacifications remove suffering.

original: ye shes sems dpa' rab bsgom bya //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' rab bsgom bya //
translated: One should meditate on the wisdom being.

original: rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di bsgom de //
analyzed: rnal 'byor gang zhig 'di bsgom de //
translated: That yogi who meditates on this

original: byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' grags pa che //
translated: is a bodhisattva of great fame.

original: gnas gsum grub pa thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: gnas gsum grub pa thob par 'gyur //
translated: One attains accomplishment in the three abodes.

original: sgrol ma'i lha mo rnal 'byor ldan //🔽rdo rje gsang rgyud bla med du //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i lha mo rnal 'byor ldan // rdo rje gsang rgyud bla med du //
translated: The yogin endowed with the goddess Tara

original: rdo rje ldan mas bris pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ldan mas bris pa'o //
translated: wrote this unsurpassed secret vajra tantra.

original: sems can ye shes 'phel ba'o //
analyzed: sems can ye shes 'phel ba'o //
translated: It increases the wisdom of sentient beings.

original: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'phags ma gnas kyi dbang phyug ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: The Sadhana of Noble Vasudhara

original: rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan mas phyung ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje ldan mas phyung ba rdzogs so /
translated: The Vajra Secret Tantra, extracted by the dakini Vajradhara, is complete.

original: // / thugs rje chen pos dbang ldan gsum bskur ba'i grub thob wa ni ta bha dra'i slob ma sam gha shr'i bha dra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: // / thugs rje chen pos dbang ldan gsum bskur ba'i grub thob wa ni ta bha dra'i slob ma sam gha shr'i bha dra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o //
translated: The disciple of Vanibhadra, the siddha who was empowered by the three great compassionate ones, Sangha-shri Bhadra, and the Tibetan translator Manjushrikeshvara, translated this.

original: rdo rje ldan ma /🔽pandi ta ba ra he ta /
analyzed: rdo rje ldan ma / pandi ta ba ra he ta /
translated: Vajradhara🔽Pandit Varahita

original: wa ni ta bha dra /🔽sam gha shr'i bha dra /
analyzed: wa ni ta bha dra / sam gha shr'i bha dra /
translated: Vanibhadra🔽Sangha-shri Bhadra🔽Manjushrikeshvara

original: 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje /🔽mkhas pas @67b phug pa//
analyzed: 'jam dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rje /🔽mkhas pas @67b phug pa//
translated: Khepa Pukpa
